Text: Neat little game, a bit different. I installed this using Comodos Sand Box (Since it's the uploaders 1st torrent), & it installed clean. The controls are a bit different, forget about keyboard as it's all mouse control. Hold the L/mouse button down when making a manouvre; push forward to jump, pull back to roll, swipe left or right to go left or right, easy. Thanks parleybo, nice 1st torrent, +1.
